Monster.Name: Blink Dog
Monster.Description: A blink dog takes its name from its ability to blink in and out of existence, a talent it uses to aid its attacks and to avoid harm.

Languages.string: understands Sylvan but can’t speak it

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Hearing and Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Teleport (Recharge 4–6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The dog magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Before or after teleporting, the dog can make one bite attack.
